sentences.english: The name of the eclipsing girl, whatever it was, has not been handed down.
sentences.chinese: 压倒群芳的少女，姓名并未留传下来。

sentences.english: Ge hundred urgent for flow, million as the beautiful flowers envy.
sentences.chinese: 百舸急争流，万任群芳妒。

sentences.english: The spring term Qunfang jealousy, grind to dust scattered into the mud, only the fragrant as ever.
sentences.chinese: 春，一任群芳妒，零落成泥碾作尘，只有香如故。

sentences.english: Vice Mayor Deng Qunfang delivered the awards to the recipients.
sentences.chinese: 副市长邓群芳为获奖者颁发了奖状。

sentences.english: In the 2004 Athens Olympic Games, China was very strong over all, he recalled.
sentences.chinese: 他说在2004年雅典奥运会上，中国力压群芳。

sentences.english: Vice Mayor Deng Qunfang met with all the delegation members.
sentences.chinese: 副市长邓群芳会见了代表团全体成员。

sentences.english: After the show, prizes were given to the best cowboy acts.
sentences.chinese: 表演结束后，奖品会颁发给技压群芳的牛仔。

definition: vying to be the most glamorous/each more gorgeous than the other/beauty contest
the queen of flowers (refers esp. to plum blossom)/(fig.) nickname for a famous beauty or courtesan
contending for supreme beauty (esp. of flowers, scenery, painting etc)/vying in beauty and glamor
divine fragrance, national grace (idiom); an outstanding beauty
face powder and eyebrow liner/cosmetics/(fig.) beautiful woman
Langyuan paradise, home of the immortals in verse and legends
hibiscus/cotton rose (Hibiscus mutabilis)/lotus/foo yung (Chinese dish similar to an omelet)
Furong district of Changsha city 長沙市|长沙市[Chang2 sha1 shi4], Hunan/Seremban, capital of Sembilan state 森美蘭|森美兰[Sen1 mei3 lan2], Malaysia
flourishing blossom/a mass of flowers/luxuriant flowers
clear as ice and clean as jade (idiom); spotless/irreproachable/incorruptible
